SFMC - Lead Double Opt In False

fieldUpdates.description: If lead rejection is rejected by manager, then this field should be set to false
fieldUpdates.name: Lead Rejected in New SFDC set to flase

fieldUpdates.description: If lead rejection approved by manger, then this field should be set to true.
fieldUpdates.name: Lead Rejected in New SFDC set to true

fieldUpdates.description: Update the field with Manager's email.
fieldUpdates.name: Owner's Manager Email Update

fieldUpdates.description: this field determines lead updates are flowing to AWS
fieldUpdates.name: SendLeadUpdatesToAWS
Set Lead Status to Marketing Engaged
Set Lead Status to Marketing Qualified

fieldUpdates.description: The lead status automatically changes to "Pending Rejection" when the rejection is submitted for approval by the sales rep.
fieldUpdates.name: Set Lead Status to Pending Rejection

fieldUpdates.description: If the lead rejection is denied by Sales Supervisor or Q Team Manager then Lead Status is set to 'Sales Working' .
fieldUpdates.name: Set Lead Status to Sales Working

fieldUpdates.description: Set Original Queue for Marketing Qualified Leads based on Q2 Sales MM/ENT Districts
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE( IF( OR(AnnualRevenue < 100000000, ISNULL(AnnualRevenue)), "MDR", IF(AnnualRevenue < 500000000, "MM", "ENT") ) & "-" & IF(REGEX(State, "^(Pennsylvania|New York|New Jersey|Connecticut|Maine|Vermont|New Hampshire|Massachusetts|Rhode Island)$"), "North", IF(REGEX(State, "^(Arkansas|Louisiana|Texas|Oklahoma|North Carolina|South Carolina|Georgia|Alabama|Mississippi|Tennessee|Florida)$"), "South", IF(REGEX(State, "^(North Dakota|South Dakota|Iowa|Illinois|Michigan|Minnesota|Kansas|Nebraska|Missouri|Wisconsin|Indiana|Ohio|Kentucky|West Virginia|Delaware)$"), "Central", IF(REGEX(State, "^(California|Oregon|Washington|Arizona|Colorado|Alaska|Hawaii|New Mexico|Wyoming|Idaho|Nevada|Utah|Montana)$"), "West", IF(AND(REGEX(State, "^(Maryland|Virginia)$"), AnnualRevenue < 500000000), "Central", IF(AND(REGEX(State, "^(Maryland|Virginia)$"), AnnualRevenue >= 500000000), "South", "MDR" /* Default for other values of State field */ )))))), "MM-North", $Label.US_MM_SDR_Northeast, /* US MM SDR Northeast */ "MM-South", $Label.US_MM_SDR_Southeast, /* US MM SDR Southeast */ "MM-Central", $Label.US_MM_SDR_Central, /* US MM SDR Central */ "MM-West", $Label.US_MM_SDR_West, /* US MM SDR West */ "ENT-North", $Label.US_ENT_ISR_Northeast, /* US ENT ISR Northeast */ "ENT-South", $Label.US_ENT_ISR_Southeast, /* US ENT ISR Southeast */ "ENT-Central", $Label.US_ENT_ISR_Central, /* US ENT ISR Central */ "ENT-West", $Label.US_ENT_ISR_West, /* US ENT ISR West */ $Label.US_MDR /* US MDR - Default */ )
fieldUpdates.name: Set Original Queue by District
Set Original Queue to Data ServicesQueue
Set Original Queue to US MDR

fieldUpdates.description: Set Original Queue for Marketing Qualified Leads to US SDR Round Robin Queue
fieldUpdates.name: Set Original Queue to US SDR
Update Approval Status to Not Required
Update Commissions Role > Don't Pay Comm
Update Created From Lead to True

fieldUpdates.description: leads that are done with Marketo tracks will enter SF tied to the LATAM Marketing queue. To differentiate these from the others that come into this queue, (site subs, etc) these will then be placed into LATAM's nurture queue for manual follow up
fieldUpdates.name: Update Lead Owner to LATAM Nurture Track

fieldUpdates.description: When "Max Lead Gen" IS NOT NULL & Lead Status = Tele - Accepted Lead > Lead Status > "Tele-Qualified" (TQL)
fieldUpdates.name: Update Lead Status to TQL

fieldUpdates.formula: CASESAFEID(Product_Account_Duplicate__c) &" "&","& RecordType.Name &" "&","& IF(Owner:User.Email = 'jayant.yadav@rackspace.com', '', Owner:User.SSO_Username__c) &" "&","& IF(LDT_Rep__r.Email = 'jayant.yadav@rackspace.com', '', LDT_Rep__r.SSO_Username__c) &" "&","& IF(Lead_Generator__r.Email = 'jayant.yadav@rackspace.com', '', Lead_Generator__r.SSO_Username__c) &" "&","& Country &" "&","& State &" "&","& CASESAFEID(rvpe__RVAccount__c) &" "&","& CASESAFEID(rvpe__RVMember__c)&" "
fieldUpdates.name: Update Parent IDs Lead
Update Status for MQL score ups
update lead owner to US ISR Queue

rules.fullName: Alert Disaster Recovery Team when a lead is created
Alert to Sales Manager if Lead not converted%2Fclosed within 48 hours

criteriaItems.value: ,Converted,Sales - Accepted Lead,Unqualified - To Lead Gen,Unqualified - To Marketing,Rejected

rules.description: Alert to Sales Manager if Lead has not been converted or closed by the Sales Rep within 48 hours of it being assigned.

rules.fullName: Alert to Sales Manager if Lead not converted%2Fclosed within 72 hours

criteriaItems.value: Sales - Accepted Lead,Unqualified - To Lead Gen,Unqualified - To Marketing,Rejected,Converted

rules.description: Alert to Sales Director if Lead has not been converted or closed by the Sales Rep within 72 hours of it being assigned.

rules.fullName: DemandGen%3A Alert Lead Generator of new Site Submission
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS( Lead_Board__c , "00Q4N00000Z2tWD"), ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , "Site Submission") )

rules.description: This will send email to Lead owner
rules.formula: AND( NOT($Profile.Id = "00e6100000163tr"), NOT(CONTAINS(FirstName,"Sales Play")), OR( ISNEW(), AND(ISCHANGED(OwnerId), NOT(BEGINS(OwnerId, "00G")))))

rules.fullName: Email Notification to Lead Owner - Innova
rules.description: This will send email to Lead owner once scrubbed by Innova
rules.formula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS(FirstName,"Sales Play")), NOT(BEGINS(OwnerId, "00G")), $Profile.Id = "00e6100000163tr", OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(OwnerId)) )

rules.fullName: Email Notification to US Lead Queue
rules.description: This will send email to Lead owner

rules.formula: OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ), ISCHANGED( Product_Account__c ), ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), ISCHANGED( LDT_Rep__c ), ISCHANGED( Lead_Generator__c ), ISCHANGED( rvpe__RVAccount__c ), ISCHANGED( rvpe__RVMember__c ), ISCHANGED( Country ), ISCHANGED( State ) )

rules.fullName: Lead Assignment Rule - Marketing Qualified APAC
rules.description: when leads change from Marketing Engaged to Marketing Qualified move to APAC

rules.fullName: Lead Assignment Rule - Marketing Qualified AUS%2FNZ
rules.description: when leads change from Marketing Engaged to Marketing Qualified move to AUS/ NZ Queue

rules.fullName: Lead Assignment Rule - US MDR to US MDR Round Robin Queue
rules.description: Reassign Leads in the US MDR queue using the US MDR Round Robin Queue

rules.fullName: Lead Assignment Rule - US Marketing Qualified to Round Robin Queues
rules.description: US Lead Assignment for Marketing Qualified Leads - See MO-425, SFDC-3160
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status,'Marketing Qualified'), OR( OwnerId = $Label.Marketing_Engaged_Queue_Id, OwnerId = '0053f000000pHFzAAM'), ISPICKVAL(Territory__c ,'US/CANADA') )

rules.description: Reassign Leads in the Data Services Queue using Round Robin Queue

rules.fullName: Lead Status - Set New to Marketing Engaged for Marketing Engaged Queue
rules.description: Set the Lead Status from New to Marketing Engaged when a Lead is assigned to the Marketing Engaged Queue. See MO-430
This WF sets Integration Status for ReadyToSyncWithAWS
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(LastModifiedDate), APN_CRM_Unique_Identifier__c != NULL, ISPICKVAL(Integration_Type__c , 'ACE CRM'), LastModifiedBy.Username !='mulesoft.user@rackspace.com.rax', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Marketing', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Pending Approval')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'SFU Required')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Unqualified - To Lead Gen')) )

rules.fullName: MQL score ups back to New Status

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8

criteriaItems.value: Fanatical Support for 0365 Navigator,Fanatical Support for O365 Aviator

rules.fullName: No activitiy on lead in 3 days
rules.description: This workflow will send an email to the lead owner if a activity hast been completed in 10 days on an open lead

rules.fullName: ObjectRocket - HubSpot Form Lead Status Update
rules.description: Created for SFDC-6371

rules.fullName: Once max lead gen info is input %28As long as lead is in tele accepted status%29%2C status should automatically change to TQL
rules.description: When "Max Lead Gen" IS NOT NULL & Lead Status = Tele Accepted > Lead Status > "Tele-Qualified" (TQL)
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Lead_Generator__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Lead_Date_Passed__c)), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Tele - Accepted Lead"))

rules.description: Update the field with Manager's email.

rules.fullName: Send Notification Email To Partners After 48hrs

rules.description:
When the "Distribution" option is selected set Commissions Role field to Dont Pay Commissions
Case #64573

rules.fullName: US MDR Email Notification to Lead Owner
rules.description: This Workflow rule is used to send email notification to the lead was subsequently assigned to an MDR user via the US MDR Round Robin queue

rules.fullName: Update Approval Status on Seller Rejection
rules.description: Lead is created and rejected by seller then approval status fields to ;Not Required' to check in Approval Process
rules.formula: AND( CreatedById = OwnerId,OwnerId = $User.Id,CONTAINS( $Label.Sales_Rep_Profiles ,$Profile.Id),ISCHANGED(Status),OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Unqualified - To Lead Gen"),ISPICKVAL(Status,"Unqualified - To Marketing")),CONTAINS( $Label.RejectReasonsforApproval ,TEXT(Reason__c)) )

rules.fullName: Update Created from Lead to True
rules.description: Update the Created From Lead to true
Update the lead owner as a Marketing Engaged Queue when the lead status is equals to Marketing Engaged.
Update the lead owner field as a US SDR Queue when the lead status is equals to Marketing Qualified.

rules.fullName: Updated Leads going to LDT queue
rules.description: push anything still routed to LDT queue, to US- SDR queue.

rules.fullName: Updated Leads going to OSR queue
rules.description: push anything still routed to OSR queue, to US- ISR queue.
